```{r}
library(data.table)

```

```{r}
test_df <- data.table::fread("/home/j.aguirreplans/comparison_power_law.txt")

head(test_df)
```

```{r}
rest <- test_df %>%
  dplyr::filter(model == "Mean") %>%
  dplyr::group_by(size) %>%
  dplyr::summarize(model_result = mean(model_result), num_edges = mean(num_edges))
head(rest)
```
